'''''Monetoo Will Guide You Home (II)''''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Natlan: The Land of Fire and Competition (II)]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to follow 10 [[Monetoo]] and complete the graffiti in [[Tezcatepetonco Range]], [[Quahuacan Cliff]], and [[Ochkanatlan]].
